title: i hope diana its part immoble mage rework
body: she is a melee mage..that is awful combo

replies.body: Sorry, but no, we're not going to be covering mobile assassin/fighter hyrbids in the update focused on immobile mages.
Will you be getting immobile tanks with AP scalings though? Those seem very important to get in the update focused on immobile mages.
I would guess that they're looking at some item changes that will help them somehow, although the only ones that I can think of who could build AP are Cho'Gath, Blitzcrank, and maybe Galio.
How have TWO people missed the joke?
You don't take anything for granted in this website, man.
I'm sure they'll benefit in some way. Probably indirectly.
Am I the only one that senses some sass in this post? xD

> [{quoted}](name=Desiderium,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=XEtnzFtA,comment-id=00090001,timestamp=2016-01-23T00:08:11.827+0000)
>
> Am I the only one that senses some sass in this post? xD

Nah, it was pretty clear LOL
Please tell me which part of 'immobile' didn't you get, I'll be happy to explain.
she has 2 dashes...
I thought her ult was the only dash?
she can use it twice in succession so easily that it might as well be two
if you land a q+r it goes on cooldown. so 2 dashes.
You're right. It's a good thing she is incredibly mobile.

Diana being a "Melee Mage" was why I bought her and tried her out in the first place. Back in the day I only used to main fighters and mages.. Little did I know I had  longing for a crossbreed between the two. A mystical fighter with a weapon infused with magic and other magical powers. It's a good idea, but her character can be better.
I think you misunderstood the words "immobile" and "mage."
"I hope that this moderately mobile AP Assassin/Fighter hybrid is in an update of immobile AP mages for which she clearly does not belong"
What part of immobile mage do you not get? Diana is amage... But she is NOT immobile.
They looking at champs like {{champion:90}} {{champion:69}} {{champion:63}} {{champion:161}} {{champion:8}} {{champion:143}}
while she is very mobile and she is an assasin.
But she isn't Immobile...
Not only is she mobile, she's an assassin, not a mage.
Lol...immobile.  Good joke.
Rumble disagrees.
Aside from the _immobile_ thing, she's more of a Fighter/Assassin. Wouldn't really consider her a mage.
The hell did I just read?
dianna is an ap fighter type that is fairly mobile see her ult that you can use multiple times if you know how to land your Q. she just doesn't have much of anything for escapes
They've announced those who would be and she's not. Also so are a bunch of other champs.
Diana's a fighter.
